input.sentences: we were able to take a beautiful trip .
the boys of the twin treated us well .
we were able to try many different exotic foods .
the scenery was like nothing i had ever seen .

output.sentences: Monks wearing orange robes are waking down a street in a tropical village.
The monks are requesting food from the people who live in the village.
The people in the village share their food, and it's delicious.
The monks, after filling their bellies with food from the kind villagers, left the banquet and traveled down a long stone stairway.
At the bottom of the stairway was a marketplace, and the monks went on to explore the area.
